import {
  difference,
  forEach,
  keys,
  isArray,
  isObject,
  uniq,
  filter,
  intersection,
} from "lodash";
import {cx,css} from "emotion";
 
export function generateStyleFlags(obj, ...args) {
  const arr = isArray(obj) ? obj : keys(obj).filter((key) => !!obj[key]);
  if (args.length) {
    return arr.concat(generateStyleFlags(...args));
  }
  return arr;
}
 
 
export default function flaggedStyles(label,flags,styles) {
 
  if (isArray(label) || isObject(label)) {
    styles = flags;
    flags = label;
    label = "";
  }
 
  if (!isArray(flags)) {
    flags = generateStyleFlags(flags);
  }
 
  if (label) {
    label = uniq((label ? [label] : []).concat(flags)).join("-");
  }
  
 
  const selected = [];
 
  forEach(styles,(style,f)=>{
 
    if (f !== "_") {
 
      const styleFlags = f.split(",");
      const negFlags = filter(styleFlags,(fl)=>(fl.charAt(0) === "!")).map((fl)=>fl.substr(1));
      const posFlags = filter(styleFlags, (fl) => (fl.charAt(0) !== "!"));
 
      if (intersection(negFlags, flags).length) { return; }
 
      if (difference(posFlags,flags).length) { return; }
    }
    selected.push(style());
  });
 
  return css`
    label: ${label};
    ${cx(selected)}
  `;
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
